name: bitsky-hello-retailer
description: A retailer service to crawl blogs from https://exampleblog.bitsky.ai/

BITSKY_BASE_URL.description: Your BitSky application's base url. Example: https://bitskyai.herokuapp.com

GLOBAL_ID.description: Global ID of the retailer service you want to connect. Example: 6e56474d-0c75-4125-b5a8-27b0ccf71390

LOG_LEVEL.description: Winston logging level. Default is `info`, find detail from https://github.com/winstonjs/winston#logging-levels
